sentences.sentence: Other dopants have also been studied.
sentences.translation: 其它掺杂剂也在研究中。

sentences.sentence: Dopants for silicon wafers are found in Groups III and V of the Periodic Table of the Elements.
sentences.translation: 晶圆片搀杂剂可以在元素周期表的III和V族元素中发现。

sentences.sentence: This paper describes the data character of semiconductor dopants and the quality control method.
sentences.translation: 本文讨论半导体掺杂薄层的数据特性和质量管理方法。
